preqs: Students must have passed AFW1000 or ACW1000 and AFW1002 or ACW1002, OR AFG1000 or ACG1000 and AFG1002 or ACG1002 before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {ACC2120, ACF2491, AFC2120, AFF2491, AFW2491}
Must be enrolled in course type {10, 41, 50}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACB1002, ACC1030, ACF1121, ACG1002, ACW1002, AFC1030, AFF1121, AFG1002, AFW1002} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: The current Australian reporting and regulatory framework applicable to reporting entities including an analysis of significant accounting standards, professional reporting requirements and legal and stock exchange requirements. Accounting for corporate groups and issues in financial reporting are also explored.
